    • Method Detail

      • find

        public static java.util.Vector<PlanningLib> find(java.lang.String where,
                                 DataConnection dc)
                                          throws java.sql.SQLException
        View is saved in database. Any modification in source code must be reflected in the definition of the view in database. SELECT pl.id, pl.jour, pl.debut, pl.fin, pl.action, p.id AS profid, p.prenom AS prenomprof, p.nom AS nomprof, s.id AS salleid, s.nom AS salle, c.id AS coursid, c.titre AS cours, c.ecole FROM planning pl, personne p, salle s, cours c, action a WHERE pl.ptype IN (1,5,6) AND pl.action = a.id AND a.cours = c.id AND pl.lieux = s.id AND pl.idper = p.id; -- and (select count(id) from plage where idplanning = pl.id) > 0 -- empty schedules not included
        Parameters:
        dc - dataCache
        where -
        Returns:
        a list of planninglib
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
